nodes.text: Flowers of Drall was a Drall anthem.

In 1 ABY Champhra Biahin, the planet Drall's ambassador to Talus, sent a recording of Flowers of Drall sung by young students at the Boiling Sea Music Academy on Drall to the chairperson of the Dearic Garden Club as a token of gratitude for the club's help in procuring a sample of the rare Twin-Scented Natterbloom.
